/*
    Author : PVSM Praveen Kumar
*/

#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<ctime>
#define eraseall(a) memset(a,0,sizeof(a))
#define DEBUG PVSM

int main()
{
     #ifndef DEBUG
       freopen("IO/input.txt", "r", stdin);
     #endif


        int N,Count=0;
        scanf("%d",&N);

        while(N!=0)
        {
            if(N%2!=0) Count++;

            N = N >>1;

        }

        printf("%d",Count);


     #ifndef DEBUG
        fprintf(stdout,"\nTIME: %lf sec\n", (double)clock()/(CLOCKS_PER_SEC));
     #endif

      return 0;
}
